name: Huecambra
description: The Huecambra is a large monstrosity with gem-like nodules on its body, capable of inflicting debilitating curses and dealing significant damage in combat.
memorable: Its ability to detonate gem-like growths causes area damage and can stun opponents, making it a dangerous foe.
goals: To engage in combat and assert dominance over its territory.
relations: It may be encountered in areas with aquatic creatures or as a guardian of specific locations.
environment: Found in both aquatic and terrestrial environments.
strengths: High damage output from multiattacks and explosive area-effect abilities.
weaknesses: Low intelligence indicates reliance on instinct rather than strategy.
attacks: Utilizes a multiattack feature, incorporating a bite, claw, and tail strike, with the bite also inflicting a curse.
most_powerful_ability: Gem Explosion allows it to deal massive area thunder damage and stun nearby enemies.
skills: It is proficient in perception and stealth, allowing it to detect threats and move undetected.
additional_information: Immune to poison and thunder damage.
Unaffected by being charmed, petrified, or poisoned.
Cursed targets suffer additional damage within close proximity.
High Constitution provides resilience against endurance-related effects.
Acts instinctively due to its low intelligence.
